===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Yundang]] [[bay|Bay]] or [[harbor|Harbor]] (篔簹[[港]]), the [[inlet]] of [[Xiamen]] [[island|Island]] [[once]] [[use]]d by the [[port]] of [[Xiamen]] ([[厦門]]).
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Yundang]] [[lake|Lake]] (篔簹[[湖]]) in [[present-day]] [[Xiamen]], [[form]]ed by [[reclamation]] [[project]]s which [[seal]]ed the [[former]] [[inlet]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Yundang]] [[subdistrict|Subdistrict]] (篔簹[[街道]]), [[part]] of [[Siming]] [[district|District]] ([[思明]][[區]]) in [[present-day]] [[Xiamen]].
